name: 赛博霓虹
description: 赛博朋克风格，高对比度，霓虹荧光色点缀

h1.base: margin: 32px 0 16px; font-size: 2.4em; letter-spacing: 0.1em; line-height: 1.2; text-transform: uppercase;

code.block: color: #22d3ee; background: #0f172a; border-radius: 8px; border: 1px solid #22d3ee; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.15), inset 0 0 20px rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.05); margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1.2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap;
code.inline: background: rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.2); padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 4px; color: #c4b5fd; font-size: 14px; border: 1px solid rgba(167, 139, 250, 0.3);

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #f0abfc; border-radius: 0 8px 8px 0; padding: 16px 20px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.9) 0%, rgba(88, 28, 135, 0.2) 100%); margin: 1.2em 0; color: #e9d5ff; font-style: normal; word-wrap: break-word; box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(240, 171, 252, 0.1);
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1.5em auto; display: block; border-radius: 8px; border: 2px solid #22d3ee; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.3);
styles.link: color: #22d3ee; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 2px solid #22d3ee; text-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.5); transition: all 0.2s ease;

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1.2em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #22d3ee; border-radius: 8px; overflow: hidden;
table.header: background: rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.15); font-weight: bold; color: #22d3ee; font-size: 1em; padding: 12px; border-bottom: 2px solid #22d3ee;
table.cell: border: 1px solid rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.3); padding: 12px; color: #d1d5db; font-size: 1em;

styles.hr: border: none; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #f0abfc, #22d3ee, #a78bfa); margin: 32px 0; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.5);

footnote.ref: color: #22d3ee; text-decoration: none; font-size: 0.85em; vertical-align: super;
